name: CYBER JOLT (VR)
description: An 80s Inspired Endless Flight Arcade Game. An infinite first person retro cyber set in a strange world of neon alien structures. VR ready.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i7-4770 3.4 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
